title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 143.2 - Authority of the director of classification and compensation to initiate shift pay differentials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 143.2 - Authority of the director of classification and compensation to initiate shift pay differentials

State Regulations

The Director of Classification and Compensation may, on his
own initiative, subject to the approval of the Director of the Budget, authorize a shift pay differential for any class (title) or series of classes
in one or more areas of the State in accordance with the provisions of
subdivision 6 of section
130
of the

Civil Service Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
143.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
